testsuite.name: Scenario: The user should be able to login with valid credentials

testcase.name: Given the user is on the login page
testcase.classname: Scenario: The user should be able to login with valid credentials

testcase.name: When the user enters valid credentials
testcase.classname: Scenario: The user should be able to login with valid credentials

testcase.name: Then the user should be able to view account balance
testcase.classname: Scenario: The user should be able to login with valid credentials

testsuite.name: Scenario: the user should not be able to login with bad credentials

testcase.name: Given the user is on the login page
testcase.classname: Scenario: the user should not be able to login with bad credentials

testcase.name: When the user enters bad credentials
testcase.classname: Scenario: the user should not be able to login with bad credentials

testcase.name: Then the user should not be able to login
testcase.classname: Scenario: the user should not be able to login with bad credentials

testcase.name: And the user should get an invalid login message
testcase.classname: Scenario: the user should not be able to login with bad credentials
